column2: "...Ah...it's you. I'm sorry...there's someone I don't want to meet, so I'm on the lookout."
"...I don't hate him, and we still complete our assigned missions just fine."
"...It's when we're off-duty. Casual conversation...is different. I simply can't."
"...It becomes very uncomfortable. And so it's best that we avoid one another. For both our sake."
"...Thinking this is in our best interests, I'm distancing myself...and yet..."
"...It makes him even more persistent to seek me out on his own."
"...Why are Hunters like this? Always thinking of themselves, forcing their own way...it's bothersome."
